title: NVO FrontEnd Dev
description: As a frontend developer, I used the React library to create user-friendly interfaces. I used Tailwind to style the components, which allowed me to create visually appealing and easy-to-use interfaces. In addition to creating interfaces, I also helped to find suitable solutions to certain problems within the company. This led me to be constantly learning about other technologies that were necessary to implement within the company.

title: .Net Freelancer
description: The DevExpress components allowed me to create complex and attractive user interfaces easily. They offer a wide range of controls and widgets, which allowed me to create custom interfaces that met the specific needs of the company. SQL Server is a robust and scalable relational database that allowed me to store and manage the company's data. Entity Framework is an ORM framework that made it easy for me to interact with the database. Using these technologies, I was able to develop the requirements that met the needs of the company.

title: Zero FrontEnd Dev
description: I played a key role in developing a web platform that streamlined internal operations for a healthcare organization. I designed and implemented the main dashboard, providing users with valuable insights and improving decision-making. Additionally, I ensured the platform was fully responsive, enhancing user experience across devices.

title: React Freelancer FrontEnd Dev
description: Identified and resolved several errors in a sanitation company's dashboard, including data visualization issues and calculation errors. Additionally, I implemented new functionalities using React and Mantine
